Package cards.career_cards

Class Accountant

java.lang.Object
cards.Card
cards.CareerCard
cards.career_cards.Accountant
All Implemented Interfaces:
MachineRandom
public class Accountant
extends CareerCard
Class implementing an Accountant career card, which dictates the player's career, degree requirement (whether it is required or not), and maximum number of pay raises associated with being an accountant

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Accountant()
    Creates an Accountant career card object

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class cards.CareerCard

    equals, getInfo, getIsDegreeRequired, getMachineRandNum, getMaxNumPayRaises, getMaxNumPayRaisesLB, getMaxNumPayRaisesUB, toString

    Methods inherited from class cards.Card

    getName

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Accountant

      public Accountant()
      Creates an Accountant career card object

      In particular, an Accountant career card object is initialized as follows:

      • Its name is "Accountant".
      • Degree requirement is true.
      • The lower bound for the maximum number of pay raises is 4.
      • The upper bound for the maximum number of pay raises is 7.

      The values enumerated above are explicitly indicated in the machine problem specifications. The initialization of the maximum number of pay raises is taken care of in the parent constructor.
